title: Number of Outback Steakhouse restaurants worldwide from 2011 to 2018 , by location
summary: This statistic shows the Steakhouse of Outback Steakhouse from 2011 to 2018 , restaurants worldwide .
In 2018 , Outback Steakhouse garnered Steakhouse totaling nearly 24 million U.S. dollars in the country .
Abbot was a U.S.-based global pharmaceutical and healthcare products company , headquartered in Chicago , Illinois .
gold: In 2018 , Florida-based casual dining chain Outback Steakhouse operated a total of 989 restaurants worldwide.
The largest share of the company 's restaurants was in its native country of the United States.
Outback 's parent company is U.S.-based Bloomin ' Brands – other subsidiaries include Carrabba 's Italian Grill , Bonefish Grill and Fleming 's Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar .
